snippet: Mediators urged the signing of a cease-fire on Wednesday as talks got under way to end a monthlong revolt, but there was little sign either side was ready to make a deal.
abstract: Mediators urge Central African Republic government and rebels to sign cease-fire as talks begin to end monthlong revolt, but there is little sign either side is ready to make deal.
lead_paragraph: Mediators urged the signing of a cease-fire on Wednesday as talks got under way to end a monthlong revolt, but there was little sign either side was ready to make a deal.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Peace Talks Begin Between Rebels and Government
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Peace Talks Begin Between Rebels and Government
